card.name: Cold Winter
card.description: Heal an ally monster's max {{HP}} to you and send it to your deck with +2/+2. If this is {{KW:GENERATED}}, give it +1/+1 instead.

description.now: Heal an ally monster's max {{HP}} to you and send it to your deck with +2/+2. If this is {{KW:GENERATED}}, give it +1/+1 instead.
description.prev: Look at {{CARD:9|1}}, {{CARD:10|1}} and {{CARD:31|1}} and choose one to burn. Add the others to your hand.
